FOTO: Ameriško robotsko letalo postavilo rekord
Plovilo X-37B je v vesolju dve leti zbiralo podatke. Izdelali so ga pri Boeingu.
03 Nov 2019, 13:45 by Miloš Krmelj



Letalo je dolgo komaj slabih devet metrov.



Izstrelili so ga leta 2017.



V vesolju lahko ostane dolgo, ker energijo proizvaja s pomočjo sončnih celic.



Pristanek na Floridi


Pred dnevi se je iz vesolja vrnilo malo vesoljsko robotsko letalo X-37B. V atmosfero je vstopilo nad Tihim oceanom, tal pa se dotaknilo v Kennedyjevem vesoljskem središču na Floridi.Izdelala ga je družba Boeing, na tokratni polet v vesolje, ki je bil njegov peti, pa so ga leta 2017 izstrelili s satelitsko nosilno raketo družbe SpaceX Falcon 9. 
Zbiralo obveščevalne podatke?


V vesolju lahko ostane dolgo, ker energijo proizvaja s pomočjo sončnih celic.

Plovilo je postavilo rekord, saj je okrog našega planeta krožilo kar 780 dni, zakaj se je tam zadrževalo tako dolgo, pa strokovnjaki niso pojasnili. Letalo brez človeške posadke je v tem času izvajalo različne eksperimente, ki so prav tako oviti v tančico skrivnosti. Nekateri analitiki domnevajo, da to malo vesoljsko letalo morda preizkuša novo generacijo izvidništva, opazovanja, komunikacij, zbiranja obveščevalnih podatkov in razvijanja malih satelitov za bodoče vojaške vesoljske programe.Plovilo je lahko v vesolju ostalo tako dolgo tudi zato, ker je izdelano tako, da električno energijo proizvaja s pomočjo sončnih celic, in ne gorivnih, ki za delovanje uporabljajo gorivo in oksidant, kot je bilo to pri Nasinem shuttlu, ki je lahko v vesolju ostal največ dva tedna. S tokratnim pristankom pa se X-37B še zdaleč ne bo upokojil.


Izstrelili so ga leta 2017.

Strokovnjaki ameriškega vojnega letalstva in Boeinga ga bodo zdaj natančno pregledali in pripravili na ponovni polet, ki naj bi ga izvedli aprila ali junija prihodnje leto.Kako je videti to malo vesoljsko letalo? Močno spominja na pomanjšani model Nasinega shuttla, s to razliko, da v vesolje poleti na vrhu običajne satelitske nosilne rakete. 
Uspešni že Sovjeti
Vesoljsko plovilo je zasnovano tako, da prenese izjemno visoke temperature, ki se razvijejo ob vstopu v atmosfero, in sicer s pomočjo posebnih keramičnih ploščic in toplotnih ovojev. Ko se spušča na pristajalno stezo, namreč doseže hitrost skoraj 480 kilometrov na uro. Razpon njegovih kril meri slabega 4,5 metra, visok je vsega 2,9 in dolg 8,9 metra. Ob izstrelitvi, poln goriva, tehta pet ton, na krovu pa ima tovorni prostor, velik kot mali dostavni avto.
780 dni je plovilo krožilo okrog Zemlje.
X-37B je prvo ameriško plovilo, ki se lahko na Zemljo vrne avtomatsko, zgolj z avtopilotom. Prva na svetu je takšno plovilo v osemdesetih letih prejšnjega stoletja izdelala Sovjetska zveza, ki je v vesolje izstrelila kar precej podobnih vesoljskih plovil brez posadke, ta so se tudi uspešno vrnila, a niso pristala na pristajalni stezi, temveč v Indijskem oceanu. Z njimi so Sovjeti preizkušali različne tehnologije, povezane z razvojem njihovega vesoljskega letala buran, ki je bilo precej podobno ameriškem shuttlu.

PHOTO: American Robot Plane Set the Record
The X-37B has been collecting data for two years in space. It was made at Boeing.
03 Nov 2019, 13:45 by Milos Krmelj



The plane is barely nine feet long.



He was fired in 2017.



It can stay long in space because it produces energy through solar cells.



Landing in Florida


A few days ago, a little X-37B space robot came back from space. It entered the atmosphere over the Pacific Ocean and touched the ground at the Kennedy Space Center in Florida. It was made by Boeing, and this time it was launched into space, the fifth of its kind, launched in 2017 by a SpaceX Falcon satellite launch rocket. 9.
Gather intelligence?


It can stay long in space because it produces energy through solar cells.

The vessel set a record for 780 days orbiting our planet, but experts did not explain why it stayed there for so long. The unmanned aircraft carried out various experiments during this time, also wrapped in a veil of mystery. Some analysts speculate that this small spacecraft may be testing a new generation of reconnaissance, observation, communications, intelligence gathering and small satellite development for future military space programs.The craft may have remained in space for so long because it is made electrically it produces energy through solar cells, not fuels that use fuel and an oxidant, as was the case with NASA's shuttle, which could remain in space for up to two weeks. With this landing, however, the X-37B is far from retiring.


He was fired in 2017.

US Air Force and Boeing experts will now review it closely and prepare for a re-flight scheduled for April or June next year. What does this little space plane look like? It closely resembles a smaller model of NASA's shuttle, with the exception that it tops a conventional satellite rocket launcher in the summer.
The Soviets are already successful
The spacecraft is designed to withstand extremely high temperatures that develop upon entry into the atmosphere through special ceramic tiles and thermal envelopes. As it descends to the landing track, it reaches a speed of almost 480 kilometers per hour. Its wingspan measures just under 4.5 meters, is only 2.9 meters high and 8.9 meters long. At launch, full of fuel, it weighs five tonnes and has a cargo space on board as big as a small delivery van.
For 780 days the vessel was orbiting the Earth.
The X-37B is the first American vessel to return to Earth automatically, using only an autopilot. The first such vessel in the 1980s was built by the Soviet Union, which launched quite similar unmanned spacecraft into space, which also successfully returned but did not land on the landing track but in the Indian Ocean. With them, the Soviets tried out various technologies related to the development of their storm spacecraft, which was quite similar to the US shuttle.
